DOC.brief_summary: A study to determine the safety and efficacy of an investigational drug in patients with obesity.
DOC.brief_title: An Eighteen Month Efficacy and Safety Study in Obese Patients (0364-020)(COMPLETED)
DOC.criteria: Obese patients with a body mass index between 30kg/m2 and 43 kg/m2, inclusive (BMI between 27 kg/m2 and 43kg/m2, inclusive for those with obesityrelated comorbidities including hypertension, dyslipidemia and sleep apnea). Patients with serious or unstable current or past medical conditions.
